caption.p: Representative members of the AVS management committee and AVS10 organising committee (top, from left to right): Jason Mackenzie (AVS Treasurer), Karla Helbig, Lara Herrero, Rowena Bull, and Heidi Drummer (AVS Vice President). (Bottom, from left to right): Greg Moseley, Gilda Tachedjian (AVS President), Peter Speck (AVS Secretary), Merilyn Hibma (Convenor), John Taylor (Co-Convenor), and Miguel E. Qui√±ones-Mateu.
